item.title: Refactoring java8 code with collector
item.description: I am planning to refactor a code that is based on Java 7 to Java 8 using the functional components, specifically Collector. The plan is simple: learn it by coding it. Let’s get started… Overview of the Java Object We Are Dealing With The following code is intend to fetch a few specific data from Company object, where company has a list of employees. I would like to perform the following operations,

item.title: Hello world
item.description: Hello everyone, I am a software architect from India. I live in a beautiful coastal city named Kochi in south India. I work as a technical architect in ibs software, where I continue to spend 15+ years of my career. I am lucky to work with a few amazing individuals who share the same passion, and I love to call them my team. During my work, I often come across a lot of things that feel like it might be really useful for everyone.
